name: War7 Ansible
abilities: The population capacity of this asset is decreased by 1 for every 2 War7 drones in orbit around this asset.

name: Spaceforce Ansible
abilities: The population capacity of this asset is decreased by 1 for every Spaceforce drone in orbit around this asset.

name: Corporate Recruitement Centers
abilities: The population capacity of this asset is increased by 3.

name: Waveguide R&D
abilities: You may draw 1 more card when this asset performs research.

name: PopFixx Boosters
abilities: Newly constructed spacecraft may enter play in any orbital of this asset.

name: Refitting Station
abilities: Instead of allocating construction on this asset, you may swap a spacecraft in orbit with one from your hand. The new spacecraft must have the same class and construction cost as the old one.

name: Debris Cleaner
abilities: Maneuver, Tap: Remove one piece of debris in orbit around this asset.

name: Cannibalized Construction Yards
abilities: When allocating construction on this asset you may choose a friendly spacecraft in orbit. If you do, deal X damage to that spacecraft and gain X construction power for this turn.

name: Repurposed Orbital Radar
abilities: Friendly spacecraft gain 2 defense delta-vee during combat with an attacker in a higher orbital

name: Parallel Construction Yard
abilities: You may initiate construction of 1 additional spacecraft while a spacecraft is being constructed on this asset.

name: Fount of Locomotion
abilities: Friendly spacecraft do not use delta-vee when transferring between orbitals on this asset.

name: Thorns
abilities: At the end of your opponent's turn, if an enemy spacecraft is in the lowest orbital of this asset, deal 1 damage to it.

name: Billboard
abilities: You must target Billboard for bombardment if it is installed.

name: Clairvoyant Agents
abilities: At the beginning of your turn you may look at the top card of the opposing player's deck.

name: 12,000,000,000 Minds
abilities: When this asset taps to draw cards, shuffle your deck before drawing.
